sentences.sentence: Furthermore, they claim that any such interference is completely ineffective.
sentences.translation: 此外，他们声称任何此类干涉都是完全无效的。

sentences.sentence: He said he had not discussed the matter with her. Furthermore, he had not even contacted her.
sentences.translation: 他说他没有和她讨论过这个问题。而且，他甚至没有和她联系过。

sentences.sentence: Furthermore, one sensory ability may back up another.
sentences.translation: 此外，一种感知能力可能会为另一种感知能力提供支持。
